mapper.select: select * from Member where m_email=#{m_email} and m_pw=#{m_pw}
mapper.insert: insert into Member (m_num, m_email, m_pw, m_nick, m_like, m_career, m_phone, m_join_date, m_name) values (#{m_num}, #{m_email}, #{m_pw}, #{m_nick},0, #{m_career}, #{m_phone},now(), #{m_name})
mapper.update: update Member set m_email = #{m_email}, m_pw = #{m_pw}, m_nick = #{m_nick}, m_career = #{m_career}, m_phone = #{m_phone}, m_name = #{m_name} where m_num = #{m_num}
